lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did Abraham see when God appeared to him?
What did Abraham do for the men?
answers: Made them a meal to eat
Built them a shelter to stay in
Gave them camels for their journey
Sang and danced to entertain them

questions.text: What did the three men say to Abraham?
answers: In one year, Sarah would have a son
Abram should move again to a new land
Abram needed to build another ark

questions.text: When Sarah heard what the three men said, what did she do?
answers: She ran outside to greet them

questions.text: When the three men asked why Sarah laughed, what did she do?

answers: Sarah gave birth to a baby
Sarah still didn't have a baby

questions.text: What did they name the baby and what did it mean?
How old were Abraham and Sarah when Isaac was born?
What did Sarah say after Isaac was born?
answers: God has given laughter to me
Everyone will bow to my son
